All functions

add_coord()

Add longitude and latitude of 'locid'

angle_of_incidence() fAOI()

Angle of Incidence (AOI)

azimuth_N2Q()

Title

closest_locid()

Get MERRA-2 grid IDs closest to the given coordinates

coord2tz_offset()

Title

deg2rad() rad2deg()

Convert degrees to radians

fDate()

Title

fetch_pvwatts()

Title

fHellmann() fH()

Hellmann function to extrapolate wind speed from 10 and 50 meters to higher altitudes

fWindPowerCurve() fWPC()

Wind power curve function. Estimates power output based on the speed of wind.

fWindSpeedExtrapolation() fWSE()

Hellmann-constant-based extrapolation of wind speed for higher altitudes

getGrid()

Get MERRA-2 grid

get_locid()

Get MERRA-2 grid IDs that overlay or intersect with given spatial object

get_merra2_subset()

Get MERRA-2 subset

ghi_decomposition()

Irradiance decomposition

gif_merra()

Quick GIF plots

hour_utc2tz()

Title

get_merra2_dir() set_merra2_options() check_merra2() merra2_info()

Get, Set, or Check content of the Directory with the MERRA2 database Subset

merra2_sample()

Get a example of MERRA2 data for a particular month(s)

plot_merra()

Quick plots of wind speed and its dynamics

poa_irradiance() fPOA()

Plane-Of-Array (POA) isotropic irradiance model

pv_array_position()

Photovoltaic Solar Panel Orientation and Performance Models

pv_array_types()

List tracking system types

read_merra_file()

Reads one file from MERRA-2 subset for a given year and month

solar_position()

Solar position

tilt.param.default()

Default tilt-parameters of tracking systems
